channel.title: Project on Hua Tuo Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Project on Hua Tuo Studio

item.title: Website rebuild
item.description:
This website is powered by Hugo.

I’ve been using the Hugo template LoveIt for a long time and it just won’t do anymore. I’ve found Paper and liked it. So, I’m using PaperMod now for this webiste. ðŸ˜º

I’ve been avoiding from spending time learning Hugo for so long. For this update, I’m going to learn while I build so I’m not hacking it blindly. I’m actually going to put some thoughts into designing and structuring the site. ðŸ˜º

item.title: RSPCA Pet Quiz Website
item.description:
I’m giving myself a ðŸŒŸ for finishing a little volunteer project for RSPCA (AU) ACT. :-)

The idea is to create a website that contains a Pet Quiz where people answer a few questions to find out what kind of pet is the best suitable for them. The logic for the website is pretty simple so I kept the design simple and clean too. The website is going to be used on iPads in RSPCA ACT’s booth at this year’s Florida (URL: http://rspcapetquiz.com).
